content.content: Discussion-forum for https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/1682 . See also Ethereum 1 dot X: a half-baked roadmap for mainnet improvements and Discussion about storage rent "eviction archive" nodes and incentives . This EIP describes a storage-rent scheme, with removal and restoration of data.
content.GPT-summary: The post is a discussion forum for an Ethereum Improvement Proposal (EIP) that proposes a storage-rent scheme with data removal and restoration. The post includes links to related discussions and a roadmap for mainnet improvements. The post includes the author's explanation of the proposal, constructive criticism from third parties, questions about the proposal, and some advertising of the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author is advertising proposal
